meta_description: The Philbrook Museum of Art is set in the historic home of Waite and Genevieve Phillips with expansive formal gardens located in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
hours_text:
# Philbrook Memberships

Members have more fun with exclusive perks, unlimited free admission, preview parties, and more – all for as little as $6 per month! Philbrook Monthly Membership is a simple way to make a lasting impact.

[JOIN NOW](https://membership.philbrook.org/monthly)

Contact our Membership Department directly at **918-748-5320**

## Universal Benefits

  * Unlimited free general admission and exhibition admission for each named adult
  * Member discounts on ticketed events
  * Invitations to exhibition preview openings
  * 10% discount on Museum retail, food, and beverages
  * Access to exclusive Member-only events
  * Discounted general admission for Member guests (Member must be present)
  * Monthly Member mailings

## General Benefits

## $65 - $500

Learn More

## Ambassador Benefits

## $1000 - $10,000+

Learn More

### $65

## Individual

$6 per Month

  * Universal Benefits
  * Membership Benefits for 1 named adult Member
  * [Pay for an annual Individual Membership](https://my.philbrook.org/donate/contribute1?ct=8).

### Student Memberships

Philbrook now offers discounted **$35 Individual Memberships** to college students! Just show a valid student ID and sign up in person to start enjoying all the perks of Philbrook Membership.

**Who qualifies?**  
All college students from accredited institutions with a current school-issued ID.

**How do I sign up?**  
Visit the front desk with your student ID to join.

[Join/Renew](https://membership.philbrook.or...

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility at Philbrook

Philbrook Museum of Art is committed to making all guests feel welcome and supported. Whether you’re visiting the galleries, exploring the gardens, or attending a program, we offer a variety of services to ensure an accessible experience for visitors of all ages and abilities. 

Need help before or during your visit? We’re here to assist. Contact us at 918-748-5300 or [guestexperience@philbrook.org](mailto:guestexperience@philbrook.org). 

### Parking & Entry 

**Accessible Parking**

Designated spaces are located near the main entrance on the upper parking deck. A drop-off zone is also available. From the lower lot, stairs lead to the main entrance. 

For Garden-level access, visit the Admissions Desk or call us for assistance or call us at 918-748-5300 to learn more about accessible parking options. 

_Access and equipment available for visitors with limited mobility:_**Admission**   
Caregivers accompanying a guest with a disability receive free admission. Just ask at check-in. 

Through Museums for All, visitors with SNAP, TANF, WIC, or SoonerCare receive $1 admission for up to 4 adults and unlimited youth (ages 3–17). Children 2 and under are always free. Show proof at check-in or call ahead to reserve discounted tickets. 

### During Your Visit

**Mobility Access**

Manual wheelchairs and walkers are available free of charge (first-come, first-served). Most areas, including exhibits and the Villa, are accessible by ramps and elevators. Note...

### Philbrook

__

Closed for Winter Break until January 21, 2026.

2727 S Rockford Road

$8 Youth (Ages 3-17)  
FREE Youth (2 & Under)  
_View below for a full list of available discounts. Not a Member?[_Join today!_](http://philbrook.org/visit/memberships/)  
  
General Admission does not include access to Special Exhibition._  
  
(918) 749-7941 

[Directions](https://goo.gl/maps/dB2fEf3eyMv)

## Admission & Discounts ____

## $5 After 5pm (Fridays)

Every Friday Museum-goers receive discounted $5 general admission after 5pm. Philbrook Members always receive free general admission. Advance, timed entry tickets recommended. Tickets available for reservation online or by phone at **918-748-5300**. Not a Member? [Join today!](/membership)

## Member Colleges

Students from Member Colleges receive free admission every day with valid ID. Advance, timed entry tickets recommended. Tickets available by phone at 918-748-5300. 

  * Northeastern State University (Broken Arrow)
  * Northeastern State University (Tahlequah)
  * Oral Roberts University (Tulsa)
  * Oklahoma State University (Tulsa)
